q01.question: Which of the following statements regarding pipelines are true (select all that apply)?

responses.a: Pipelines are the ultimate manifestation of the Unix Philosophy.
responses.d: Pipelines work by sending the standard output and error of one process to the standard input of another process.
responses.e: Pipelines are an uncommon computational pattern only found on Unix systems.

q02.question: When using curl, we sometimes need to use the -L flag. Why is that?

responses.a: This flag tells <tt>curl</tt> to filter any URLs present in the requested resource.
responses.b: This flag tells <tt>curl</tt> to save the requested resource to the local file system.
responses.c: This flag tells <tt>curl</tt> to follow any HTTP redirects in the requested resource.
responses.d: This flag tells <tt>curl</tt> to listen on a specific port for the requested resource.

q03.question: When using grep or sed, we sometimes need to use the -E flag. Why is that?

responses.a: This flag tells grep and sed to interpret patterns as shell globs.
responses.b: This flag tells grep and sed to interpret patterns as extended regular expressions.
responses.c: This flag tells grep and sed to interpret patterns as literal strings rather than regular expressions.
responses.d: This flag tells grep and sed to interpret patterns in an case-insensitive manner.

q04.question:
Given the list of words located at /usr/share/dict/words on the student machines (or https://yld.me/raw/bf7U online), use filters and pipelines to perform the following tasks:

  1. Count the number of words that end with the letter "y". ____

      abacay
  abactinally
  abandonedly
  abasedly
  abashedly
  ...

  2. Ignoring case, count the number of words that start with the letter "b". ____

      B
  B-
  b
  B911
  B.A.
  ...

  3. Ignoring case, count the number of words that have three consecutive vowels (ie. a, e, i, o, u). ____

      ...
  zygophyceae
  zygophyceous
  zygophyllaceae
  zygophyllaceous
  zygopteraceae

  4. Ignoring case, count the number of words that contain the pattern "vowel-character-character-vowel", where "vowel" and "character" refer to the same character respectively. ____

      ...
  zocco
  zoccolo
  zoeller
  zorillinae
  zorro

  5. Count the number of words contain at least two digits, but don't end in a digit. ____

      10-point
  10th
  11-point
  12-point
  16-point
  ...
